This is one of the best games I have ever played. Unfortunately, the game is open to griefers that constantly interrupt online games. This basically makes the game unplayable. Additionally, Steam does nothing about it when you complain or try and get an account blocked. If you want to have fun, don't buy this game. Unfortunately, there are people out there such as Account:Bitcoin that make a brilliant game unplayable for those that actually enjoy games in a good spirit. I have done some research and it appears to be a problem with Left4Dead2 as well. So unfortunate.
It's the best co op survival game there is. Instant classic, A flawless performance by Valve! 10/10 A++
This is a really good game.

Reviewing game I played a long time ago:

I love Left 4 Dead. But nowadays the game is fully ported to Left 4 Dead 2, and seeing that both are cheap and at the same price there's absolutely no reason to buy the original instead of the sequel.
not recommended if you suffer from motion sick.

Sobre esta receta de bizcochuelo casero
AdemÃ¡s de ser una receta de torta fÃ¡cil, queda un bizcocho hÃºmedo, alto y esponjoso.

Es hÃºmedo porque es un bizcochuelo con aceite en lugar de manteca, ideal para cualquier receta de torta o para espolvorear asÃ­ nomÃ¡s con azÃºcar impalpable y comÃ©rselo en dos bocados con el mate antes de poder rellenarlo ( le pasÃ³ a una amigaâ€¦)

Este bizcochuelo fÃ¡cil lo puede hacer cualquier cristiano, en serio.

Al ser un bizcochuelo sin manteca es mÃ¡s hÃºmedo y econÃ³mico.

Y si nada mÃ¡s querÃ©s que la casa te huela a bizcochuelo de vainilla, y ademÃ¡s comer sin azÃºcar, tambiÃ©n podÃ©s probar esta receta de bizcochuelo mega facil.

Ingredientes
(nada nadita de manteca)
-3 huevos

-1 taza de azÃºcar

-1 taza de aceite (neutro)

-2 tazas de harina 0000

-1 cdita de polvo para hornear

-esencia de vainilla

Paso a paso para hacer este bizcochuelo casero
sale con fritas, bueno, con fritas noâ€¦ o si querÃ©s sÃ­, sobre gustosâ€¦
1-Vamos a cascar los huevos y volcarlos en un recipiente junto con el azÃºcar y lo vamos a batir. Yo uso la batidora pero obvio que se puede hacer a tenedor alzado. Este paso se llama â€œcremarâ€ la mezcla. Justamente, es batir hasta que aclare un poco el color y se vuelva espesa la mezcla y crezca.

2- Una vez que veamos que la mezcla aclarÃ³ y creciÃ³, vamos a agregar el aceite y a seguir batiendo. La idea es que sea un aceite neutro que no aporte un sabor demasiado fuerte a la preparaciÃ³n.

3- Agregamos unas gotitas de esencia de vainilla y seguimos batiendo y batiendo.

4- Una vez que estÃ¡ todo unido, vamos a dejar de batir y vamos a agregar la primera taza de harina junto con la cucharadita de polvo para hornear, tamizÃ¡ndolos con un coladorcito.  Mezclamos, esta vez sÃ­ con una espÃ¡tula y movimientos envolventes.

5- Una vez que se incorporÃ³ todo bien, agregamos al segunda taza de harina y repetimos el procedimiento de mezclado.

Ahora viene el momento en el que nos toca evaluar cuÃ¡n espesa nos quedÃ³ la mezcla (en el video se puede ver una referencia, pero igual confÃ­en en sus criterios bizcochueleros).

Si ven que les quedÃ³ muy espeso, pueden ir agregando chorritos de leche de a poquito hasta que la mezcla consiga la consistencia deseada. por el contrario, si ven que quedÃ³ muy lÃ­quido, se hace lo mismo pero con la harina.

6- Una vez que la mezcla consiguiÃ³ la consistencia ideal, nos queda enmantecar y enharinar un molde y volcarla adentro sin mÃ¡s rodeos.

7- Al horno 180Âº por entre 40 y 50 min aproximadamente. Â¡Sean pacientes! dejen el horno cerrado hasta que pasen los primeros 40 min porque sino nuestra maravillosa creaciÃ³n corre peligro de pincharse y no es lo que queremos.

8- Â¡Momento de la prueba del palito! Pasados los 40 minutos, podemos abrir el horno e introducir un palillo o cuchillo dentro del bizcochuelo, si sale seco, quiere decir que estÃ¡ listo y es momento de sacarlo. Sepan que antes de desmoldarlo es muy conveniente dejar que se entibie, para correr menos riesgo de que se rompa. A su vez, hay que no dejar se termine de enfriar para que el calor no lo humedezca.

[h1] NO LO COMPRES [/h1]

Left 4 Dead 1 es el primer juego de la saga, y cuenta con campaÃ±as y personajes memorables, pero no compres este juego a menos que desees la insignia o cromos, etc, tooooodas las campaÃ±as de este juego (todas) estan remasterizadas en el left 4 dead 2 [b] GRATIS [/b], si compras este juego [strike] (yo lo compre sin saberlo y cuando lo vi me quise cortar las bolas jajasjdjadj) [/strike] estas perdiendo plata que podes gastar en otro juego a cambio de no gastar plata en este y solo comprarte el 2, que te trae todo lo del 1

[h1] ConclusiÃ³n [/h1]

Left 4 dead 1 es un juego muy divertido y entretenido no solo para jugar con amigos (hasta 4 jugadores) sino que tambiÃ©n para jugarlo en solitario esta muy bien, solo que me caga que no digan nada en la pagina de steam y que no te hagan saber de la remasterizaciÃ³n de todas las campaÃ±as al l4d2 [strike] (por lo menos yo no lo sabia xd) [/strike]

Pros:
Incredible atmosphere
Good graphics
Great replay value
A lot of fun with friends
Awesome soundtrack
Likeable survivors (Zoey is my favorite â¤ï¸)

Cons:

Still, comes highly recommended 12 years after release.

im gonna put a thumbs up for the game as i know how good this games is and would like people to know how good it really is however i have a ryzen 5 2600,rx 580 and  8gb of corsair vengeance ram and for some reason my screen would stop in place but if i tabbed out and came back in it would work for 10 seconds and then do the same again (i have a 144hz monitor aswell) but i would still reccomend this game as its amazing and hopefully no one has to experience what i did. im very sad

Trust me, I've easily put hundreds of hours into the Left 4 Dead franchise without even realizing it. This is a review for the series overall.

What can possibly be said about Left 4 Dead that hasn't been regurgitated as a food critic would a savory meal they can't help but stuff down their throat? It's a perfect co-op experience, one that utilizes its horror roots and the zombie genre to its absolute best. The excitement of being stuck in a do or die situation is elevated by every step you take towards the next saferoom, and each campaign's finale doesn't overstay its welcome with over-the-top climax leaving you both satisfied and ready for more.

The game is infinitely replayable due to the AI-Director, never once giving you the same experience and forcing you to use your wits as well as your map knowledge to complete the game on subsequent playthroughs. You may as well pass on this game if you expect to beat it without any cooperation with teammates, and though some people will despair in thinking your AI allies are useless and the randoms online aren't much help, that's part of what makes the game so brilliant. The AI is serviceable to get you to the end, and randoms could be equal parts good or bad-- yet it's with friends that this game truly shows its coop prowess as a titan of the genre. 

With varied game modes including a flair of competitive options, you've got a co-op game that's guaranteed to satisfy any player from the fun-loving casual to the ever-vigilant competitor.

Ã–ncelikle oyunu tek oynamayÄ±n bu benim dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼ncem. ArkadaÅŸlarÄ±nÄ±zla beraber bir gÃ¼nÃ¼nÃ¼zÃ¼ ayÄ±rÄ±p bitirebilirsin gayet eÄŸlenceli ve kaliteli vakit geÃ§irmiÅŸ olursunuz. CS veya League of Legends'dan illetlerinden kurtulmak iÃ§in ideal.

I've been playing this game for 10 years now on PC, and the memories, friends, and experiences are something I will cherish and hold dear to me forever.

Unfortunately, with the game being 12 years old now, there are way less players than when it first came out, which probably goes without saying-- but it's still as fun (to me), and in general, as it was when it first came out, or when I first downloaded and started playing it. 

Would 100/10 recommend it.
